brief_summary.textblock:
A Randomized, Double-blind, Multicenter, Phase 3 Study of Pelubiprofen Tab. & Celebrex Cap.
      for Comparative Evaluation of Safety & Efficacy in Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 3 Study of Pelubiprofen Tab. & Celebrex Cap. in Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Adult males/Females aged 18~80 years

          2. Patient who are taking NSAIDs for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis

          3. Patients who belong to ACR functional class 1, 2, 3

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. Patients who belong to ACR functional class 4

          2. Patients who are hypersensitive to clinical trial medicines or excipient

          3. Patients who have experience of Cerebrovascular bleeding, bleeding disorder

clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Multicenter, Phase 3 Study of Pelubiprofen Tab. & Celebrex Cap. for Comparative Evaluation of Safety & Efficacy in Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients

oversight_info.authority: South Korea: Korea Food and Drug Administration (KFDA)

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in '100 mm pain VAS' value from baseline

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver), Primary Purpose: Supportive Care
